list.name: Logical reasoning
list.description: I find it easy to deal with complex problems.

list.name: Planning
list.description: I'm able to understand and plan complex flows and systems.

list.name: Good Listener
list.description: I find it easy to understand customer problems and propose the best solutions.

list.name: Design & UX
list.description: I struggle planning beautiful designs, usually my projects tend to be minimalists, focusing more on functionality than appearance.

list.name: Time and Priorities Management
list.description: Sometimes I can take wrong decisions about what task should be delivered first and how much time I would really take on it.
